column2: PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. WE ARE IN POSITION. ALPHA AND BRAVO IS GOOD TO GO. ALPHA OUT.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. CASTLE HAVE BEEN CLEARED, I REPEAT CASTLE HAVE BEEN CLEARED. OVER.
ALPHA TO FOXTROT. PROCEED TO THE TARGET AREA. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. ENCOUNTERING HEAVY COUNTER ATTACKS, INCLUDING ARMORED VEHICLES. REQUESTING CLOSE AIR SUPPORT. OVER.
ECHO BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE ARE IN AMBUSH POSITION, ROAD IS MINED. WE ARE READY. ECHO BLACK OUT.
FOXTROT BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. CONVOY IS IN POSITION AND READY TO BEGIN. OVER.
ROGER ALPHA. WE ARE ON OUR WAY. SEE YOU SOON. FOXTROT OUT.
FOXTROT TO ALPHA BLACK. WE ARE STUCK IN THE HARSH TERRAIN! CANNOT MOVE, SORRY CANT MAKE IT THERE IN TIME. I LET YOU KNOW WHEN WE GET OUT OF THIS MESS. FOXTROT OUT.
ALPHA THIS IS FOXTROT. GOOD NEWS, WE ARE MOVING AGAIN. TARGET AREA ETA TWO MINUTES. OVER.
ROGER ALPHA, GOOD WORK. SECURE THE AREA AND RADIO THE CONVOY WHEN YOU FEEL ITS SAFE. PAPA BEAR OUT.
ROGER THAT ALPHA. WE DONT HAVE ANY AVAILABLE AIRCRAFTS TO DISPATCH AT YOUR LOCATION. WE WILL TRY TO FIND SOMETHING. HOLD TIGHT. PAPA BEAR OUT.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS PAPA BEAR. GOOD NEWS, YOUR CLOSE AIR SUPPORT IS ON ITS WAY. JUST FEW MINUTES. GOOD LUCK. PAPA BEAR OUT.
